title: Boy with Sheep
caption: Once upon a time, there was a boy who watched over sheep. Bored, he played a trick.
prompt: A young shepherd boy sitting on a hillside, watching a flock of sheep grazing peacefully. The boy looks bored and mischievous.

title: False Alarm!
caption: He cried, "Wolf! Wolf!" The villagers rushed to help, but there was no wolf.
prompt: Villagers running uphill with farming tools (pitchforks, shovels) towards a flock of sheep. The shepherd boy is laughing hysterically in the background.

title: Another Lie
caption: The boy did it again. Again, the villagers were fooled. They were angry!
prompt: Similar to the previous image, but the villagers look angrier and more frustrated as they realize there is no wolf. The boy's laughter is more taunting.

title: The Real Wolf
caption: Then, a real wolf appeared! The boy cried, "Wolf! Wolf!" truly scared.
prompt: A large, menacing wolf approaching the flock of sheep. The shepherd boy looks terrified, pointing and yelling.

title: No One Believes
caption: But the villagers ignored him. They thought he was lying again.
prompt: The villagers are shown in their village, going about their daily lives. They are dismissive and ignoring the distant cries of the boy.

title: Wolf Among Sheep
caption: The wolf attacked the sheep. The boy's lies had consequences.
prompt: The wolf attacking a sheep in the flock. The shepherd boy watches in despair.

title: Emptiness
caption: The village mourned their lost sheep. Trust was broken.
prompt: A desolate hillside with only a few remaining sheep. The shepherd boy sits alone, looking ashamed and regretful.

title: The Moral
caption: Honesty is always the best policy. Lies destroy trust and harm everyone.
prompt: An open book with the words 'Honesty is the best policy' clearly written on the pages. The background is a simple, neutral color.

title: Building Trust
caption: Once lost, trust is difficult to regain. Choose your words wisely. Speak the truth.
prompt: A group of people helping each other to build a wall of bricks, symbolizing trust. The background should be a bright and optimistic landscape.

title: Reflecting on Actions
caption: Think before you speak. Your words have power. Use it wisely.
prompt: The shepherd boy, now older, sitting alone on the hillside, looking thoughtful and introspective. He's no longer smiling, but has a contemplative expression.
